1660810.name: Fantasy Grounds - The Griffon's Saddlebag Volume 2
1660810.description:
The Griffon's Saddlebag Volume 2

By: The Griffon's Saddlebag
These 50 unique niche-filling weapons and items are flavorful, balanced, and ready for you and your players to enjoy. These creative new items are designed to open up new opportunities for roleplay and combat while staying balanced and fun to use at the table.

Features

As a Griffon's Saddlebag product, you can expect the following benefits:

  • Low-Prep Setup.     Metadata tagging, along with identified and unidentified item handouts, save you hours of prep time.

  • Ledger.     All items come listed on a single sheet for ease of access, and includes simple instructions for use.

  • Professional Art.     The Griffon's Saddlebag's art bring life to every item with remarkable attention to detail.

  • Fine Attunement.     These items have been rigorously reviewed for balance and are fully-ready for use in your games.
Included items:

  • Bard-in-a-Box
  • Container of Heat and Frost
  • Pair of Tiny Violin Rings
  • Pomade of Ten Thousand Styles
  • Steps of the Trickster
  • Torpedo Arrow
Uncommon

  • Battlechef Buckler
  • Braided Quarterstaff
  • Candle of Anti-light
  • Frefil's Jolly Oozebean Sugarbombs
  • Hand of the Master
  • Hasty Sugarbombs
  • Kindle Egg Sugarbombs
  • Knocking Boots
  • Pack of Levibubble Sugarbombs
  • Potion of Dragon's Breath
  • Servitude Choker
  • Silver Eagle Weapons
  • Socks of the Well-rested

  • Cloak of the Boundless Spirit

  • Druidic Throwing Club
  • Enchantment Breaker
  • Eye of Dendallen

  • Frost Giant Fork

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: 
Ryan Yingling
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
